subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Denard Span had an R.B.I. single with two outs in the 15th inning and host Minnesota rallied to beat Milwaukee, 5-4, on Sunday in the longest game played at the two-and-a-half-year-old Target Field.
snippet: Denard Span had an R.B.I. single with two outs in the 15th inning and host Minnesota rallied to beat Milwaukee, 5-4, on Sunday in the longest game played at the two-and-a-half-year-old Target Field.
